answerText: entropy[10] Entropy, like mass, particle number, and volume, is this kind of property, which are directly proportional to the amount of material in a system and are additive for noninteracting subsystems.
heading: Penn-ance |2012 | 12 | 21 | Science | Chemistry | College
subject: Science
question: Question: This quantity is the conjugate variable of temperature, and d of it is equal to dQ over T. For 10 points each: [10] Name this quantity symbolized S, which is roughly equal to the disorder of a system.
